name: TKTLVRecord
desc: The base class encapsulating a Tag-Length-Value record.

items.name: class func sequenceOfRecords(from: Data) -> [TKTLVRecord]?
items.desc: Creates and returns an array of TLV records from the specified data.

items.name: init?(from: Data)
items.desc: Creates and returns a TLV record from by parsing the specified data.

items.name: var tag: TKTLVTag
items.desc: The tag field of the record.

items.name: typealias TKTLVTag
items.desc: The type used to identify TLV format tags.

items.name: var value: Data
items.desc: The value field of the record.

items.name: var data: Data
items.desc: The record data, including the tag, length, and value fields.
